content.question: The graph of the function f, which has a domain of [0, 7] , is shown in the figure above. The graph consists of a quarter circle of radius 3 and a segment with slope -1. Let b be a positive number such that <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>b</mi> </msubsup> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>0</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4482@</annotation> </semantics> </math>.  What is the value of b?

choices.label: There is no such value of b.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
